name: streamingapp-monorepo
description: Plataforma integral de streaming con backend Node.js, frontend React+Vite y Storybook
author: Kike Torillo <arellanestorillo@yahoo.com>

scripts.dev:local: docker compose -f docker-compose.local.yml down --volumes --remove-orphans && docker compose -f docker-compose.local.yml up -d --build
scripts.dev:local:restart: npm run stop:local && npm run dev:local:up
scripts.prod:restart: npm run stop:prod && npm run prod:up
scripts.dev: echo 'âš ï¸  Usa comandos especÃ­ficos: dev:local o dev:host' && npm run dev:host
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend/app && npm install && cd ../.. && cd frontend/app && npm install
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix:backend && npm run lint:fix:frontend
scripts.lint:fix:backend: cd backend/app && npm run lint -- --fix || true
scripts.lint:fix:frontend: cd frontend/app && npm run lint -- --fix || true

scripts.clean:full: npm run clean && docker image prune -af && docker volume prune -f && docker network prune -f
